name: Trapped! 3 Quiz | Video Games Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Kyle has found himself in the Dragon Realms.  He must fight Gnasty Gnorc and Ripto.  The dragon elders know that this purple dragon will one day be the greatest dragon ever.  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Spyro.

	Spyro first appeared in "Spyro the Dragon" in 1998 for the PS1 where he fought against Gnasty Gnorc.  Gnasty had frozen all of the dragon elders throughout the realms, and Spyro's job was to free the dragons and defeat Gnorc.  Hunter is a cheetah who appears throughout many "Spyro" games, as is Sparx, who is a dragonfly.  Bianca appears in "Spyro 3: Year of the Dragon".

questions.text: Now Kyle has found himself as a lombax.  He is followed around by a little robot.  Titles of this game series include "Up Your Arsenal" and "Going Commando".  What video game has Kyle found himself in now?
questions.explanation:
Ratchet and Clank.

	"Ratchet and Clank" was first released in 2002 for the PS2.  Ratchet is a bobcat-like animal that is known as a lombax, and Clank is a robot.  Most "Ratchet and Clank" games are rated T for teen, with the exception of 2008's "Ratchet and Clank: Size Matters", which was E10+.  A spin-off was made of the series, entitled "Secret Agent Clank".

questions.text: Kyle has now found himself trapped as an alien character named Cryptosporidium 137.  The goal of the game is to annihilate all of mankind.  Much action takes place in Capitol City, with the final battle taking place in the Octagon.  What video game is this?
questions.explanation:
Destroy All Humans!.

	"Destroy All Humans" was released in 2005 for the Xbox and the PS2 and takes place in the 1950s.  The game parodies many real-life locations and people such as the Pentagon (Octagon in the game), Washington, D.C. (Capitol City), Area 51 (Area 42), and President Truman (President Huffman).

questions.text: Kyle has now been trapped in a video game where the main character does not talk, and is a human with pointy ears.  However, his partner, who is very loudmouthed, is an ottsel.  The main character seems a bit un-human, however, since he gains certain abilities by using eco energy.  What video game is this?
questions.explanation:
Jak and Daxter.

	"Jak and Daxter" is a series of video games for the PlayStation.  The first video game was "Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy", released for the PS2 in 2001.  In this video game, Jak is a 15-year-old boy who does not talk, but his otter-weasel companion, called an "ottsel", does all the talking for him.  In the game, the main enemies are Gol and Maia, who try to conquer the world using Dark Eco.

questions.text: Though this game has a very simple concept, the gameplay can be somewhat difficult, if you don't know the pattern.  Kyle has found himself as the main character, who is simply a yellow orb with a mouth.  He must collect blue dots in order to advance a level, but watch out for ghosts that can hurt you!  Oh, and eat a piece of fruit along the way if you can.  What classic arcade game is described?
questions.explanation:
Pac-Man.

	"Pac-Man" was originally released as an arcade game in 1980.  Many different versions have been made for all sorts of platforms, and even a "Mrs. Pac-Man" has been made.  The goal of the game is to eat all the blue dots on a screen to advance a level.  Mr. Pac-Man can also eat ghosts when they are blue and afraid.  The ghosts are named Inky, Pinky, Blinky, and Clyde.

questions.text: Kyle has become trapped in another classic arcade game.  This game involves a little monster-like alien thing who must turn all the cubes on a level a certain color to advance.  He is followed by other monster-like alien things who try to stop him.  What classic game is this?
questions.explanation:
Q*Bert.

	"Q*Bert" was originally released as an arcade game in 1982.  While being created, "Q*Bert" was called "Cubes".  It was also called "Snots and Boogers" (which many of the characters happen to resemble) and "@!#?@!?" (the sound Q*Bert makes when he dies, which denotes swearing).  Q*Bert's enemies are Coily, Ugg, Wrong-Way, Slick, and Sam.

questions.text: Though the characters in this series are a bear and a bird, which are very real in the human world, the bird is known as a red-crested breegull.  Throughout the game, Kyle, who is trapped inside the game, also encounters Jinjos, which is a species of animals with beaks.  What video game has Kyle been sucked into now?
questions.explanation:
Banjo-Kazooie.

	The first in the "Banjo-Kazooie" series was "Banjo-Kazooie", released for the N64 in 1998, but re-released in 2008 for the Xbox 360.  Banjo is the name of the honey bear in the game, and his sister, Tooty, also plays an important role in the game.  Kazooie is the name of the female red-crested breegull who assists Banjo on his journey.

questions.text: Kyle has become trapped in yet another video game.  This time, he can play all sorts of characters.  Though many characters are human, he is also able to play several alien species to help him through the free play mode, such as Gungans, Wookiees, and even a Rancor, and some characters can even ride Taun Tauns or Banthas.  What LEGO series video game is Kyle in now?
questions.explanation:
Lego Star Wars.

	"Lego Star Wars: The Video Game" was released in 2005 for many different platforms, and the sequel, "Lego Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy" was released in 2006.  In 2007, "Lego Star Wars: The Complete Saga" was released, which combined both the games.  In 2011, "Lego Star Wars III: The Clones Wars" was released, and it was based off the "Star Wars" animated television show.

questions.text: Kyle has been trapped in a movie-made-video-game!  In the game, he can play as Ginormica, The Missing Link, Dr. Cockroach, and B.O.B. (not to be confused with B.o.B., the rapper).  What video game is Kyle is now?
questions.explanation:
Monsters vs. Aliens

	"Monsters vs. Aliens" was released for several platforms in 2009.  The game followed the main characters from the movie, each using their special abilities throughout the game.  It can also be a two-player co-op game.  The movie, "Monsters  vs. Aliens" was also released in 2009.

questions.text: Kyle has become one last video game character, this time a little pink guy with red feet and little arms.  He may not look threatening, but this guy packs a punch.  He saves the world on numerous occasions from King Dedede.  What video game series has Kyle found himself in now?
questions.explanation:
Kirby.

	Kirby is a video game character who has been in many games since the first release, "Kirby's Dream Land", in 1992.  In 2010, he appeared in the Wii game "Kirby's Epic Yarn", where everything was made out of yarn, and he even used balls of yarn as weapons.
